CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 2, 1946, pg. 14, reads: "First Nighters - Mr. and Mrs. Jew McPherson [McPhierson] are real first-nighters, attending all opening events. Mr. McPherson [sic] is co-owner of the popular Skyrocket Grill in Homestead. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Emanuel "Jew" McPhierson and his wife Mrs. McPhierson, surrounded by three other men, including one wearing U.S. military uniform, in Continental Bar at Crawford Grill No. 1
